short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate, record and scan plugin for Blacklock scans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record user navigation and trigger Blacklock scans directly through the plugin or manually upload the scan data to the platform. How us use: 

1. Download and install the plugin from the Chrome Store.
2. Go to Extension settings and enable "Pin to toolbar" and "Allow in Incognito".
3. To run a vulnerability scan directly from the plugin, please follow the below steps:
    3.1 Click on plugin from toolbar and go to Plugin Settings (wheel bar on top-left). Enter API key 
    (Login to Blacklock --> Settings --> Manage API) and Scan ID (copy from Blacklock dashboard).
    3.2 Enter the target URL and click on Start. 
4. Browse the application as an unauthenticated or authenticated user.
5. Click on Stop.
6. Click on "Upload Data and Start Scan. Optionally, download the URL file and session data to validate the target URLs.
